text: The 2017 Bangkok Challenger II was a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It was second edition of the tournament and part of the 2017 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Bangkok, Thailand between 9 and 14 January 2017. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Janko Tipsarević |144 |1 |- | |Christian Garin |211 |2 |- | |Aslan Karatsev |235 |3 |- | |Zdeněk Kolář |244 |4 |- | |Grégoire Barrère |247 |5 |- | |Yannick Mertens |251 |6 |- | |Axel Michon |259 |7 |- | |Václav Šafránek |261 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of January 2, 2017. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Phassawit Burapharitta * Patcharapol Kawin * Werapath Sirijatiyaporn * Chaleechan Tanasugarn The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Daniel Altmaier * Sriram Balaji * Lee Kuan-yi * Jimmy Wang ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Janko Tipsarević def. Li Zhe, 6–2, 6–3. ===Doubles=== * Sanchai Ratiwatana / Sonchat Ratiwatana def. Sadio Doumbia / Fabien Reboul, 7–6(7–4), 7–5. Bangkok Challenger II Category:Bangkok Challenger II
title: 2017 Bangkok Challenger II
